subject: Investing
title: Herd Mentality and FOMO
description: A micro-lesson that makes Herd Mentality and FOMO usable.

hook.text: In 2021 millions bought meme stocks because everyone else was. Most who bought late lost over 60%.

buildup.text: Herd mentality is the urge to follow the crowd, amplified by social media and viral stories.

discovery.text: FOMOâ€”fear of missing outâ€”makes investors buy after prices have already surged, at the worst time.

twist.text: Historically, assets that attract the most hype deliver below-average returns over the next five years.

climax.text: An investment plan written before the frenzy is the best antidote to herd-driven decisions.

punchline.text: When everyone is excited about an investment, the easy money has already been made.
